channel.title: Topological Data Analysis on murmuring in the background
channel.description: Recent content in Topological Data Analysis on murmuring in the background

item.title: the mapper construction in base R
item.description: Several mature, open-source implementations of the mapper construction now exist, including the standalone Python Mapper module and KeplerMapper, part of the scikit family. I’m currently experimenting with Matt Piekenbrock’s R package Mapper, which is not on CRAN but makes—from my beginner’s vantage point—exemplary use of the R6 system.1 What these implementations have in common is that the underlying construction is mostly hidden from view. Users can specify its constituent parts, but what gets visualized is almost exclusively either
